name: Oddish

evolution.description: Oddish can evolve into Gloom at level 7 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Weed Pokémon. It may be mistaken for a clump of weeds. If you try to yank it out of the ground, it shrieks horribly.

abilities.name: Chlorophyll
abilities.description: This Pokémon’s speed is doubled in harsh sunlight.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.
